EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Feet Football Programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Lakefront Early Years Parents (Pre-Nursery, Nursery and Reception),
Here is some information from our friends at The Guangzhou Football Academy about their Happy Feet Football Programme for children aged 3-5 years:
Welcome back!
Our Autumn term Happy Feet Football Programme starts on Saturday 30th August.
Please come and join our exciting programme, which helps develop young childrenâ€™s motor skills and football ability.
Please feel free to browse our website:
www.hongkongfootballacademy.com
For more information, please CLICK HERE or contact us directly via email enquiry@hkf-academy.com or phone +86 159 2076 1172
Thanks and best wishes,
The British School of Guangzhou
